# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ioredis`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for ioredis (https://github.com/luin/ioredis).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/ioredis
